name: University (established
description: This is 'University (established', a new video game from Outhouse Media. See the description below.)Please visit the links for the other characters,:And complete the form below if you're interested in joining the rest of the team.: We're a small studio, so if you like our game we'd love to hear from you.Each week we'll have a new character chosen by you. We choose a random Sorted Deck. We start with a fresh deck. Each week we'll select a new Sorted Deck.If you'd like to help choose new characters, please fill out the form below:With the help of you, we'll draw down all the cards until we have an awesome, extravagant Sorted Deck.: All items are original and we use the best quality materials. I hope you enjoy your chance to try some new things with us.: We're a small company. We make videos for free, but we're looking for a large enough contributor to make us a profitable business. We're looking to raise around $10,000 to make this a reality. We'd be more than glad to take your advice if you would be willing to help us reach that goal.: We are the designer and studio of the video game, "The government are in trouble! Get out of there!" (content created by @MM_EVIL). We are the team behind this amazing video, and we just want to share our game with everyone.You can view our first commercial video here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wxw
